*These white papers represent in-depth technical analyses, methodological frameworks, and implementation guides developed for research and statistical computing applications. Each document provides detailed specifications, best practices, and reproducible workflows.*

```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    const searchInput = document.getElementById("paper-search");
    const categoryFilter = document.getElementById("category-filter");
    const paperSections = document.querySelectorAll(".paper-section");
    const paperItems = document.querySelectorAll(".paper-item");
    
    function filterPapers() {
        const searchTerm = searchInput.value.toLowerCase();
        const selectedCategory = categoryFilter.value.toLowerCase();
        
        paperSections.forEach(section => {
            const sectionCategory = section.getAttribute("data-category");
            const matchesCategory = selectedCategory === "" || sectionCategory === selectedCategory;
            
            if (matchesCategory) {
                // Show section and check individual items
                section.style.display = "block";
                
                const itemsInSection = section.querySelectorAll(".paper-item");
                let visibleItemsInSection = 0;
                
                itemsInSection.forEach(item => {
                    const text = item.textContent.toLowerCase();
                    const matchesSearch = text.includes(searchTerm);
                    
                    if (matchesSearch) {
                        item.style.display = "block";
                        visibleItemsInSection++;
                    } else {
                        item.style.display = "none";
                    }
                });
                
                // Hide section if no visible items
                if (visibleItemsInSection === 0 && searchTerm !== "") {
                    section.style.display = "none";
                }
            } else {
                section.style.display = "none";
            }
        });
    }
    
    searchInput.addEventListener("input", filterPapers);
    categoryFilter.addEventListener("change", filterPapers);
});
</script>
```
